title: Unable to log in
body: I was just joining a RANKED game and my client crashed with an error unable to connect to pvp.net now I'm stuck on a perpetual logging in screen. I'm going to be very upset if I get a leave notice. What is going on RITO ?

replies.body:
I double checked and we don't have any server-wide login issues for NA today, so I believe that this may be an issue with your network not being able to connect to ours.   The fact that you disconnected and then weren't able to connect at all makes this all the more likely.

To help start the process of fixing the problem, I'd go ahead and follow the steps in our [Connection Troubleshooing Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664).  It covers the most common connection errors and will give us a better idea of what's going on if we need to troubleshoot further. Lemme know if it helps!
